title: First Look: Sony KD49X720E 4K HDR LED X720E Series
description:
In this video we take a more in depth look at the new Sony KD49X720E LED TV.  For more details or to place an order please visit us at Abt.com: http://www.abt.com/product/112135/Sony-49-BRAVIA-Ultra-HD-4K-LED-HDR-Smart-HDTV-KD49X720E.html?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=video&utm_campaign=KD49X720E%20_20170718 

Features:
The dramatic contrast, color and detail of 4K HDR
4K X-Reality PRO provides lifelike detail and clarity
Improved contrast with enhanced brightness and black levels
Lifelike motion with Motionflow™ XR technology
Quick access to YouTube™ & Netflix™ with a single click
Enhanced sound and clear dialog
Leave no cable exposed with hidden cable routing
